tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    account_id INT,
    is_suspicious BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_transactions (
    suspicious_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    reason TEXT,
    flagged_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id INT,
    flagged BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE flagged_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    flag_reason VARCHAR(100),
    flagger_id INT,
    flag_date TIMESTAMP,
    resolved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    account_id INT,
    flagged BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE accounts (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_name VARCHAR,
    balance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE flags (
    flag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    flag_reason VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE suspicious_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    flag_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (flag_id) REFERENCES flags(flag_id)
)
